RefrigeratorCavity.Label: Refrigerator
FreezerCavity.Label: Freezer
PantryCavity.Label: Drawer
ControlLock.Label: Control lock
ControlLock.Description: Lock the controls to prevent unintended use of the appliance
Notifications.Label: Notifications
Notifications.Description: Start or stop notifications for individual notifications at any time
SabbathMode.Label: Sabbath mode
SabbathMode.Description: Sets the appliance to remain in a non-disturbing state during Sabbath. The interior lights will turn off and audio is silenced
MaxCool.Label: Max cool
MaxCool.Description: Accelerates the cooling process for your refrigerator
MaxIce.Label: Max ice
MaxIce.Description: Accelerates the ice making production for your refrigerator. This setting will not operate until the Ice Maker is turned on
AutoNightLight.Label: Auto Night Light
